description.english: Your journey begins! Conquer your first country.
Conquer 10 countries. Your influence begins to grow.
Conquer 50 countries. The world begins to take shape under you.
Conquer 150 countries. The march toward domination continues.
Conquer 200 countries. Half the globe is under your control.
Conquer 300 countries. Earth is only the beginning.
Conquer 400 countries. The world bows to your rule.
Conquer 500 countries. All resistance has been crushed.
Start 1 trade mission. A small step into the world of commerce.
Start 5 trade missions. You’re learning the ropes of interconnectivity.
Start 10 trade missions. Your network grows.
Start 50 trade missions. Your influence spans continents.
Start 100 trade missions. Earth’s markets rely on you.
Start 300 trade missions. Your trade empire is unmatched.
Start 400 trade missions. Your economy shapes global policy.
Start 800 trade missions. Wealth is your ultimate tool.
Start 1,000 trade missions. Every trade route leads back to you.
Discover your first country and ignite the spirit of adventure.
Explore 10 countries. Your maps begin to take shape.
Explore 25 countries. Knowledge is power.
Explore 100 countries. Half the world is uncovered.
Explore 150 countries. Global dominance starts with knowledge.
Explore 250 countries. Your maps define reality.
Explore 300 countries. You know more than anyone else.
Explore 400 countries. You see everything.
Explore 500 countries. Earth’s secrets are fully revealed.
Lay the foundations of progress with your first production building.
Build 10 production buildings. The foundation of power grows.
Build 20 production buildings. Industry fuels your rise.
Build 60 production buildings. The world takes shape.
Build 110 production buildings. The future belongs to you.
Build 150 production buildings. Your structures define the new era.
Make your first building upgrade. Quality above quantity
Make 10 building upgrades. Your upgrades are shaping the foundation of progress.
Make 25 building upgrades. The skyline begins to reflect your vision of power.
Make 200 building upgrades. You've transformed the land into a tapestry of progress.
Make 600 building upgrades. Your vision reshapes continents and creates thriving empires.
Make 1,000 building upgrades. The world stands as a monument to your brilliance—an eternal legacy.
Make a revolt in 1 country. The fire of a true revolution begins with a spark.
Make revolts in 10 countries. Revolution is contagious.
Make revolts in 40 countries. Nothing can hold back the tide.
Make revolts in 80 countries. Chaos reshapes the world.
Make revolts in 110 countries. You are the people’s hero—or their terror.
Take a loan of 5k. Correct financial knowledge is the key to a new order.
Take a loan of 20k. Bigger risks lead to greater rewards.
Take a loan of 150k. The banks know your name.
Take a loan of 300k. Borrowing powers your ambition.
Take a loan of 500k. You’ve reshaped the planet’s economy with debt.
Complete 1 mission. Every great leader starts with success.
Complete 10 missions. You’re becoming a force to be reckoned with.
Complete 50 missions. Your plans are studied by your enemies.
Complete 200 missions. Your plans echo across continents.
Complete 500 missions. The entire planet bends to your will.
Buy 300 churches. The world’s faith lies in your hands.
Buy 1,500 churches. Your legacy is written in the stars.
Buy 100 churches. A new age of faith dawns.
Buy 1 church. The holy site of your domination
Buy 10 churches. Your spiritual influence grows.
Make 1 country upgrade. The first reform for a new order.
Make 35 country upgrades. Innovation drives your reign.
Make 200 country upgrades. Your name will forever be linked to progress.
Make 1 army upgrade. Great armies stand on discipline.
Make 5 army upgrades. Your troops are becoming more formidable.
Make 10 army upgrades. Your forces grow in strength and efficiency.
Make 100 army upgrades. Your military reforms reshape warfare.
Make 250 army upgrades. Your armies dominate the planet.
Make 500 army upgrades. You are the ultimate symbol of martial supremacy.
Buy an army unit. Rookie who will become a general.
Fully upgrade one unit. Your first unit now stands as an unstoppable force.
Buy 6 units in one army. You’ve assembled a force to be reckoned with.
Buy a submarine. The seas are no longer a mystery with your new asset.
Buy artillery. The sound of thunder now echoes from your forces.
Buy AA. The skies are yours to protect from any threat.
Join Discord. Unite with fellow commanders for tactical discussions.
Join YouTube. Connect to the global spy network.
Build 50 production buildings. The gears of progress turn.
Build 90 production buildings. Your industry shapes the globe.
Build 140 production buildings. The Earth is your workshop.
Have 2,000 power. Your influence begins to spread across the globe.
Have 3,000 power. Your strategies are being felt on every continent.
Have 4,000 power. Your strength is undeniable, and nations are on alert.
Have 7,000 power. You stand at the edge of global domination.
Have 10,000 power. The world watches as your might grows.
Have 15,000 power. The world now operates under your strength.
Have 18,000 power. You are the defining power on Earth.
Have 26,000 power. Your reach spans the entire globe.
Have 30,000 power. You are the undisputed ruler of Earth, and no force can stop you.
Conquer 5 countries. Others start to notice your strength.
